meanings.definition: Incoherent or meaningless speech or noise.
meanings.sent1: The children's babblement filled the room with happy chatter.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't understand the babblement coming from the other room.
meanings.sent3: The babblement of the birds outside made me smile.
meanings.sent4: The babblement of the stream soothed my mind.
meanings.sent5: The babblement of the crowd at the concert was overwhelming.

meanings.sent1: Her babblement about unicorns and rainbows was entertaining.
meanings.sent2: I try to avoid engaging in pointless babblement.
meanings.sent3: His babblement about aliens taking over the world was amusing.
meanings.sent4: The babblement of gossip can spread like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The babblement of the TV hosts was mindless and boring.

meanings.sent1: The babblement of the distant waterfall was calming.
meanings.sent2: The babblement of the brook could be heard from afar.
meanings.sent3: The babblement of the wind through the trees was peaceful.
meanings.sent4: The babblement of the coffee machine in the background was comforting.
meanings.sent5: The babblement of the bees in the garden was a gentle hum.
